website_summaries.verdict: This model combines the closeness and convenience of a 4-blade alignment with a motor that matches the power of some higher priced models.
pros: The 4-blade alignment offers a fast shave without irritation
Comes with the long-lasting battery and wet and dry convenience of other Panasonic models
This model stands out for the 14,000 cuts per minute dual motor, which rotates the blades and the head of the razor simultaneously for an impressively close shave
cons: The head is slightly bulkier than some Panasonic razors, making it more difficult to navigate, especially on smaller faces

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Razor - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and I bought it for me! I needed a high quality electric razor that could shave my legs. Traditional disposable razors were chewing up my legs (I guess after the age of 50 your skin changes). So my next best option is finding a great electric razor. The traditional women's electric razors fall flat. The old adage - 'you get what you pay for' - is so true! This is a little more expensive, but it works great! Highly recommend this electric razor for women!
customer_reviews.author: pianokam

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was reviewing my old orders and I saw this one purchased in 2013. I said how come I never wrote a review about this. this is by far the best electric shaver. battery lasts a week. shave razor-like without any irritation. I use it wet or dry and either way works great. I remember changing the blades (but not the screens), just because it was recommended to be changed every 18 months. no need really. It's funny though I bought it for 95$ in 2013 and now I see the listed price is 110$. I guess nothing newer has come yet. anyways I recommend this shaver. and btw I think it's the only Japan made shaver on the market.
customer_reviews.author: rashnew

customer_reviews.title: Overrated razor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric razor for my husband. Upon receiving, he quickly took it out of the box and charged it overnight. The next day he used it and was disappointed. Not only does it not give him a clean shave but it was extremely difficult for him to get all the hair out of the blades. Quickly returned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Your search is over! Arc 4 is simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Made in Japan. Cons- None yet. This razor is amazing. I have super tough beard stubble. It's like steel wires coming out of my face. After ordering it took 3 days. Like 4 days of face growth by the time it was in my hand. Quick charged to 100%. There's a timer on the display! 5 minuets for the first shave. Just learning how she runs. A great shave. The next two shaves have literally been razor close! This shaver works like a Japanese product should!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Consumer alert!
customer_reviews.text: Page 3 of the instructions state: "The supply cord cannot be replaced. If the cord is damaged, the appliance should be scrapped." So if you leave the cord in the hotel bathroom, or if your dog chews it, or you tug too hard on the cord, you're out of luck! Chicanery, pure and simple!
customer_reviews.author: marcia l. vose

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I returned this as soon as I opened the box. This does not have 4 blades as advertised, only 2.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Betian

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few of the <$25 shavers over the years and nothing came close to a blade's cleanliness. After hours of research I decided to try this one out and love it. The flex head makes for easier contour following when you're half awake. It can be used wet or dry, i prefer wet due to it getting warm after a couple of minutes of dry use through a moderately think hair. It cut's well to about 1/4" in length and then the hair is just to long to get grabbed well, it'll do it, just not effectively. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CapnJoe

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Shaves close. One drawback is the head is too large. Makes it difficult to shave between lip and nose. Also, too easy to hit off button while shaving. Also, the blades wore out after about six months; supposed to last one year. Can't just order blades, need to order the foil too which is still good. My old Panasonic ES8103 is almost as good a razor for much less money but has fewer blades and less powerful motor. So this new model is somewhat better. But the unusually large head is a nuisance and the blades wear out too quickly. This is an updated review. I kept the total stars at three. Could be three and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Les Gapay

customer_reviews.title: Close shave on the neck.  Update: Not recommended. The razor has stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: ****October '15 Update****** Do NOT Buy ******* The shaver sputtered and died within 3 months. A nasty shock for me, but quite convenient for Amazon as their return policy is only for 1 month. If you are considering this, or for that matter, any other Panasonic shaver, do keep this fact in cognizance. The shaves are close on the face. However, with this razor, shaving on the neck is a close shave with daily bleeding from scrapes and nicks. Do want to give it a month as the cuts are not deep, and the skin is regenerative with pain lasting only a hour after shaving. Though that made me take of couple of stars off its otherwise stellar handling.
customer_reviews.author: Tassajara

customer_reviews.title: A great man-scaping tool.
customer_reviews.text: My husband became disabled in 1986 from a vehicular accident and I have placed him into a nursing facility two years ago when it became too difficult for me to take care of him. He has been moved to another wing and I was concerned that he had not been shaved. The staff required an electric shaver, in the meantime, they shaved him and now there is the electric shaver. Tom would not be capable of taking care of himself, and I am relieved that he has been placed where he is well taken care of and loved.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Kossack

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many electric razors over the years and find that razors marketed to women lack power, battery life, or cutting ability. Generally, even the “name brand” pink ones die within months. I ordered this men’s razor after seeing a few women recommend it. It really does a good job and seems more sturdy and up to the challenge. So far I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: neysa dion

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but was kind of disappointed about the closeness of the shave. I really thought it would have a close clean shave. I have to pass several times on face to get clean on normal stubble. I also use it on my head after first use my head was irritated but as said in previous read reviews and instructions the skin needs to get used to a new technique of shaving. I was going to return for the Arc5 but decided against it and will stick with this one. I could always use as a phase one and follow up with a secondary source for the clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: No very smooth  ES-LA63-S
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed ... This doesn't cum facial hair very good.. have to keep going over and over and over... really upset with this shaver. I have had lots of Panasonic shavers and all were great.... not this one.. maybe it has defective cutters but gee they are 49 dollars and this is NEW... Shame on You panasonic
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to shave my head. I have sensitive skin to where I can't use a standard shaver/cream combo. I was using a one blade for a while which was ok but took for ever to shave and it still wasn't a clean shave. Now with this thing I get a razor like shave without any irritation, bumps, or razor burn, and it takes no time at all to get the job done. I love this thing! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Best Shave Ever for Under $100.
customer_reviews.text: I been using the Panasonic Arc4 for about a month. The Arc4 replaced my Norelco. I have to use an electric shaver because I'm on blood thinners and can't use a blade to shave. Was very happy to find that the Arc4 provided a close and comfortable shave just like a blade without the threat of a cut. Besides giving a great shave one of the features that made me purchase the Arc4 was the feature allowing you to shave either wet or dry. Great shaver and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: close shave
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a few days but I decided to switch to this from a 3 head rotary shaver for years. The top rated shavers were Braun straight heads but they were $300. This was rated nearly as high as the Braun but far less expensive. The shave is very close. Don't feel the need to follow with a hand razor anymore and cleaning this razor is a snap compared to the rotary razors. It also shaves far faster than the rotary razor did.
customer_reviews.author: mark horn

customer_reviews.title: Best Wet/Dry.....Better than Braun 7
customer_reviews.text: I found the Panasonic Arc4 far superior to the Braun 7. I have used the Braun for about 2 years. When the Braun 7 electronics completely malfunctioned, I purchased the Panasonic. What a big difference. Much, much closer shave with less pressure on the skin. Noticeably lighter and easier to hold and shave in the shower. Also, to me, it's quieter than the Braun. Overall, I would highly recommend the Panasonic Arc4 Wet.Dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This razor stopped working after less than a year and then the replacement unit died as well
customer_reviews.text: My original razor had problems with the LCD screen so Panasonic replaced it under warranty. Now, my replacement product isn't working right. I have another dud LCD screen plus the razor starts up, untouched at al lhours of the day or night. Panasonic won't replace it because the original purchase was 24 1/2 months ago and they only give a two warranty. However, i've had a working model for less than two years including the time i waited for a replacement product. Don't buy a Panazonic razor!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mountain Reader

customer_reviews.title: Provides close shave but very messy
customer_reviews.text: This Panasonic shaver provides a close shave but it is very messy, as it fails to capture all the cut stubble / shavings. I'm going back to Norelco shavers, which provide just as close a shave but is very clean (captures all the stubble / shavings). PROS: * Provides a close shave. * Looks great and quality workmanship. CONS: * Very messy as the shaver fails to capture cut stubble / shavings. * Loud. * Expensive (there are cheaper alternatives that provide just as close a shave but not as messy or loud).
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Closest shave I have had for a long time. Bought this razor to replace a Norelco three rotary head razor. At first, it did not shave close. The literature recommended allowing about two weeks. I did so, and now I am getting an excellent shave every time. I like this razor. Well built and easy to clean (very). If you buy one, allow time for your face and your razor to get to know each other. then they will be "close" friends for a long time! I was going to purchase a Braun, but reviews of the Braun model I selected were not great, plus it cost more. I'm happy with the Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Still requires shaving cream for no burn.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a three blade rotary shaver. I'm 40 and don't grow much and the rotary has always done a good enough dry shave. It was time a shaver so I got this one. But dry its a much closer shave and will get you burning. So I'm using it every other day with cream and just quickly using the rotary the next day since this one gets such a close shave. So I'm gonna keep it around but probably shouldn't have gotten for my purposes. I might as well use a blade if I have to use cream.
customer_reviews.author: J. Joines

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no different that an $80 model
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while now. It does not blow my socks off compared to my old $80 Phillips. It sends clipping everywhere so you must clean it after every use. Battery needs to be charged at least twice per week. My shaves are about 10 minutes Monday through Friday. Cuts well after a few days of growth. I haven’t changed the blades yet and at their price point I won’t until I notice a downturn in performance. If i had it to do over again I would buy something else. For the money I expected better
customer_reviews.author: sara brassil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a shaved head
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, wondering if this electric razor could come close to my razor shave for my head. Well, the first time blew the skepticism out of the water! My head was damn near as clean as a razor would be, and in some areas actually closer. I am thrilled with the purchase knowing it will only get better as my head and skin gets used to it. Based on my initial use, I would highly recommend it for someone who shaves their head!
customer_reviews.author: Ed N.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my prior Panasonic wet/dry shaver which I had for several years. So I thought I would try this more expensive model since the old model was no longer being sold. Floating head design seems awkward to use Noticeable fall off in sharpness within six months. Foil has moving parts--started to stick and fail to move in less than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Z

customer_reviews.title: Been one of the best razors I’ve had.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this razor. I have always been a fan of Panasonic but never got the razor before. Mostly have stuck with Bruan and Norelco. However I would strongly recommend this razor. The battery life is amazing. The shave is very close and thorough. It’s been over a year now and I still love this razor. The only complaint I would have is that shaving the hairs under your nose can be a little difficult. The head on the razor Is large and somewhat bulky. However this is a minor setback to an overall great razor.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few other razors in the past and this one is hands down the superior product. Although an electric razor will never be as clean as a blade razor, this comes close! Also, I have sensitive skin and this has been the least irritating of all electric razors I have tried. I did follow the recommendation of using only the electric razor for the first 30 days and have continued to use this as my daily razor. I will break out the blade razor only if several days have gone by without a shave. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MFM

customer_reviews.title: Great razor....
customer_reviews.text: I'm 71 years old. This is the first Panasonic razor I have ever owned. Wow, I don't know why I waited so long to buy one. This has given me a much closer shave than any razor I have ever owned. I have only had it a few weeks but I am really amazed. I only shave about every 2 or 3 days and it has no problem giving me a close shave each time. If you are looking for a close shave then buy it. I don't think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie G. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: My Head Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Arc4 going on 5 years and it still works great for shaving my head. Have used every other day, cleaning after each use just by using the included small brush on the blades. Maybe once a month I do a good cleaning with running water then put it on the holder and set it to dry. Good up keep on it is the secret to making it last so long. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: 10 years...and it is still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gem in 2010 for hubby, and had Replacement Inner Blade & Outer Foil Set done once. This beast still works wonderfully with battery holding charges just fine (85% vs new). Compared to the top model Braun those were bought before, this one lasts the longest and retain the same level of effectiveness thanks to it being Made in Japan. Hubby loves it so much, now he kinda wants to retire it, so he can get the Arc5... Of course, it refuses to quit and he isn't unhappy at all. Thank you, Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Shroomy

customer_reviews.title: Defective after just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This shaver gives a very close shave, but mine just got defective after only 6 months. Although it still works, it shows garbled numbers on the digital display. I use it everyday, having to charge the battery every 3 days. Update: One more vote of confidence for Amazon. I reported the situation and they one-day shipped a new one. Amazon with no doubt is the most customer-centric business on earth.
customer_reviews.author: Just one reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Panasonic shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Panasonic shavers for years. My last one gave me at least 8 good long years and it was finally time to replace it. This shaver delivers a clean close shave, quietly and quickly. The battery life is long and it is easy to clean. At first I thought the head was kind of big and bulky and thought it might be difficult to use in tight places but that hasn't been the case. This is a well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Top-tier electric razor
customer_reviews.text: This is without question the best electric razor I've ever used. I've tried at least three others from Philips, Remington, etc. and none of them got as close of a shave as this particular razor. Don't get me wrong - nothing beats shaving with a manual razor, but this electric razor gets pretty close. My face is smooth to the touch after shaving, with only a faint feeling of stubble. The bulky head makes it a bit difficult to thoroughly shave the mustache area, but it's otherwise a fantastic razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: This razor is magnificent. Very well made. quite. outstanding shave! Easy to use. Self cleaning feature is awesome. Cannot say enough good things. I have owned several electric razors! I am glad I spent a bit extra for a super-high-end razor!
customer_reviews.author: Lemonjello

customer_reviews.title: Closest, smoothest, most comfortable shave out there at an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been hooked on this brand since about the time it first ever hit the market around 1988 if memory serves. They started out as the best wet/dry electric razor out there, and they have only gotten better and better with each iteration. Factor in the unbeatable price on Amazon, and the closest and most comfortable shave going, and I rest my case.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Close shave
customer_reviews.text: The problem with my previous electric razor was that it left a slight stubble. This razor shaved right to skin level and is fast too. You don’t need to go over and over a patch of skin to get it close.
customer_reviews.author: W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The shaver works well for a couple of months and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shaver works well for a couple of months and then the LED display starts to die. I have purchased 2 and had a replacement on each (total 4) in the last 3 years. I use it in the shower every morning and within 6-8 months the LED display dies. This kind of result is a design problem. Will give Panasonic a call in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: PSU82

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer stated that he went 3 day's without a shave and the razor did a great job. I have a beard that if I don't shave for 5 days I'll be able to trim it and it looks like a beard. I haven't had an electric razor that could handle not shaving from Friday morning till Monday morning and get a good shave. I alway have had to use a 5 blade razor to get a good shave. This razor however has gotten through a 3 day beard without a problem. I absolutely love this razor.
customer_reviews.author: tbear13022

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two Braun 5000 series. The first one I loved till I broke no fault of unit. The 2nd one I have had to replace the batteries 3 times in 5 years and it did not shave as smooth as my first unit. This razor is great. The shave is very smooth and close. The batteries give you 5 good shaves without slowing down. It's also quieter that the braun
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Met my high expectations
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I've owned yet. Especially impressed by how well it cuts dry. I was expecting to need to do a wet shave for a close/comfortable cut, but really works well -- and fast -- w/o the shaving cream (although I do still use a manual razor a little on the spots on my neck where the hairs grow funny and it would take too long trying to get every one with the shaver). That fact that it's made in Japan was a strong selling point for me. They build things to last in my experience. I'll update if I run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: ESLA6363- If you buy it you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this razor for 10 years and it still works great. With no battery changes I'm beginning to wonder if the razor might outlast me. I use it mainly in the shower with occasional dry use. A great, quick shave that is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: You can't get anything better for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Panasonic ES-LA63-s shaver a week ago to replace an earlier version that had seen better days. Batteries weren't lasting very long between charges and they are pretty much a proprietary item. This new version is even better than the last one... a lot better. If you are looking for a close, fast shave from an electric shaver, this is the one to get. Much better than the Braun 7 or anything else I have ever owned. And it does chins and necks with ease and quickness, as well. I just hope Panasonic doesn't remove this excellent item from their line.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara V.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Razor!
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye Braun, and hello Panasonic! Love this razor. Very gentle to the face, and provides a good shave. No planned-in expendables either, as with Braun cleaning fluid cartridges. Just pop the blade assembly off occasionally to blow or wash out the dust. Made in Japan, a good thing in my opinion. The only downside might be the eventual cost of the cutter head parts, but this is typical off all electric razors.
customer_reviews.author: nuke

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Razor I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad because he uses an electric razor and his old one broke. He normally uses a much more inexpensive Norelco model with the three round discs but I decided to bump him up to this more expensive model. He absolutely loves it. I haven't used an electric razor in a long time but tried this one for kicks and it worked so amazing that I ended up buying another one for myself. This honeslty gets as close as a blade and the fact you just pop off the screen and run it under the faucet to clean is a real convenience. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've used an electric shaver for approximately 35 years. I use a blade razor about 4 times a year. In my experience this is the closest you'll ever get to feeling like you've had a "blade" shave. I've had two Braun's and numerous Norelco's that I prefer over the Braun. This Panasonic is superior to both of them. It is easy to use and I actually enjoy the experience. It leaves my skin very smooth and I've not experienced any irritation as I've experienced with other electric shavers. My neck area has always been sensitive and subject to irritation but not with this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent razor; I like it better than the rotary one I had for the last five years but it looks like it may be slightly more expensive for the replacement heads; good battery life with LED readout that is very handy
customer_reviews.author: Randal  S Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sweet razor
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father in law, he uses it a lot. I use it on him to help keep his side burns trimmed. He had it to take to the hospital for an extended stay. Love that you can rinse it under water to clean
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Great razor however foil life is too short (less than a year) and replacement expensive
customer_reviews.text: Razor works great. Gives a clean shave. In seven months of every day usage, the foil developed holes. It's recommended that the foil be replaced annually. Mine barely made it beyond half way. Was unable to buy the foil separately. It's offered with 2 new blades and costs almost half as much as the razor. Reminds me of computer printer where it's not the printer but the ink replacement where the profit is made. Wish the foil had a longer life or that replacements cost half as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A truly great shaver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He found the handle comfortable to use. The razer does a good job of shaving his "tough" beard off. The design makes the razor easy to clean which is a plus. In addition, he really like the sideburn attachment. Surprisingly, my husband gives this a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. Middendorf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how close shave I get with this product. This is the first shavers I bought in my life and will be the last. I am taking very good care of it. Before this the closet shave I got to this was from a barber in India.
customer_reviews.author: ayako

customer_reviews.title: Not any improvement over my old Norelco.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now. It's not really any better than my old $75 Norelco 3-head rotary, and it doesn't last as long on a charge. I've tried it wet and dry, and it just takes a lot of passes to get a good shave. For the price I was expecting more. I will probably go back to a 3-head rotary when this dies. Could just be my face :)
customer_reviews.author: Chimpyjnuts

customer_reviews.title: Great Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: As a woman who gets horrible razor burn/bumps on my legs when I shave with a regular razor, this shaver has been amazing. The battery lasts a long time, and the shave is SUPER close! My husband has to be clean shaven for his job, and even uses it with no issue!
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wet/dry shave
customer_reviews.text: My husband had an earlier model of this razor. It was his first wet/dry razor and he loved it. When it wore out he knew he wanted to go right back to the same thing only upgraded. He loves this. It charges super fast. And it's a super quick shave. His face is crazy sensitive so it's important for him to only hit each spot of his face once and this razor doesn't disappoint there!! It comes with a nice travel bag. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pool

customer_reviews.title: good for me
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for me. So, I had order one more so that I could use in my office. But, the problen was not the item but the packing(?) human was the devil~ The item I received lately was second handy thing so that many dirty mass, dust and scars inside and outside. And even the head cover was not seen in the box. How could this happen to me! Of course, I'll return it .
customer_reviews.author: Jeon S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shave for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I shave every morning and my follicle hair is thick.. I've used many other shavers over the many years and I must say that ES-LA63-S shaver is excellent. Stretching your facial skin during shaving, and using the proper shaving cream, I was able to get the best results. Clean and smooth. I attached a photo showing a recommended shave cream that works well with this shaver. - Regards and Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The foil head is wider, the blade is not
customer_reviews.text: What good is having a wide shaving head when the actual blade is the same size, and has the same number of cutting edges, as the smaller, less expensive version? Marketing gimmick. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: riversurf58

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Gives a great shave. The battery life is excellent. I charge it once per week and it’s never below 50%. Clean up is a snap. Don’t waste your money on the cleaning system.
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: Really good close shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor based on the reviews stating Panasonic gives the closest electric shave - it did not disappoint! The ARC 4 is just the right size and easy to use. Got the charger/cleaner base, which I agree is not necessary for cleaning, but is convenient for soap cleaning, holding and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from LA63 to LA93 after 6 years! These are work horses & offer a great shave option for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I've got sensitive skin and a thick beard hence using razors were always causing burns, even when I used 4 blade razors. Shaving a 3 or 4 day stubble was the hardest. But that was all solved by using the Panasonic ES-LA63-S Arc4, that I was using for over 6 years! It helped me complete at least 90% of my shaving need and some stray hairs that I couldn't get off quickly, I'd use the 4 blade razor. But this razor now gets me to 99%! Yep, that's awesome. It's a little quieter than the LA63 and does the job with ease. The cleaner cum charger is a good add on but even without it it's a brilliant buy.
customer_reviews.author: Varun

customer_reviews.title: Not the shave I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping it would shave time off my mornings...unfortunately that hasn't been the case. It might have to do with my face shape, but I end up having to go over the same areas multiple times and this thing still misses a lot of hair. Even the trimmer struggles with what seem to be easy spots to handle. Overall, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G. whitesides

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Had hope to get a better shave than my Norelco that I have had for 20 years. The shave is a little better, but did not meet my expectations, which admittedly may be too high for an electric razor. So I like it, but am not bowled over. An update - the trimmer function no longer works which is a big disappointment inasmuch as that was one of the primary reasons for buying it. Tried to get help from the manufacturer, but all they seemed to be willing to do is charge me for explaining my problem. Tried to find an owner's manual but none seems to be available. Bummer!!
customer_reviews.author: Golfert

customer_reviews.title: ... and I think the Ark for gives me a better shave then the Ark five love them both the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an ark for Enak five now and I think the Ark for gives me a better shave then the Ark five love them both the great Panasonic makes a great razor better than anything else out there good looking terrible use of all easy manoeuverable get my jar it’s my cheeks does a great job Panasonic and get a great job with this unit thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mark kemesky

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Panasonic Razor Yet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Panasonic electric razors for the past 5 years and this razor is by far the best of the best. In the past I had been using the 2 headed foil. Now that I have upgraded to the three foil head and I couldn't be happier. I usually always do a wet shave and it seems to get as close as a straight razor! Shaving on the neck can be a bit tricky, but gets the job done after multiple passes/angles. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: dasaunders

customer_reviews.title: so im guessing somethings bad it the saver thingy
customer_reviews.text: over the time using this, i dont know if i can get a replacement or whatm but i been finding this cutts very VERY poorly on my neck and i always have to go back n use a razer. it makes blunches out my neck. (it cuts when it wants, and plain out will not cut when face is wet.. it takes far to long to cut then i ever exspaceted. so im guessing somethings bad it the saver thingy..
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy fragile foils
customer_reviews.text: First, even though it claims to provide a smooth efficient shave it was constantly hurting my skin. Now less than a month after getting it the foils are damaged which cause me to cut myself shaving. I haven't dropped it and I'm fairly careful in how I handle it. At some point though it bumped into something and the way too fragile foil got damaged. I'll be replacing this with NOT a panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Great shave, and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Great razor! And its much quieter than my older Panasonic. I tried shaving half my face with my older one and half with this one --- there is a noticeable improvement with this one. Did I mention how much quieter this one is? The older Panasonic, (about 3 years) is so loud that it is painful when shaving around your ears. This one just hums. I love it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald G.

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth Panasonic razor and I believe they make a superior razor. I have been using an electric razor ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Panasonic ES-LA63-S Arc4 Ive owned.I believe that that its an outstanding electric razor. This is my fourth Panasonic razor and I believe they make a superior razor. I have been using an electric razor for 65 years and tried them all before selecting Panasonic, so I have a lot of experience with electric shavers. One note you cannot switch from a blade razor to electric razor and expect to get a great, you must use it for few shaves to condition your beard.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F.

customer_reviews.title: I like how you have control over manually cleaning it
customer_reviews.text: First time buying an expensive razor compared to a $40 one. There's an obvious difference: this one works. I like how you have control over manually cleaning it. So far it holds it's charge. It has a nice zipper case to keep it in, with a lid over the foil. Feels nice on my sensitive skin. I'm a female and use it on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. It’s actually 5+
customer_reviews.text: Replaced older model and it works terrifically. I highly recommend. Shave in the shower in minutes. It’s smoother than regular blades without the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not for someone accustomed to shaving with a blade.
customer_reviews.text: First and most important, this is my first purchase of an electric shaver. I've used a blade for over fifty years, so bear in mind, I'm not comparing this shaver to any other electric shavers. If I had to live with this shaver, I could, but a blade is both quicker and better. A lot quicker. The best time with the electric was two minutes, fifteen seconds. With a blade, I can easily shave in fifty to sixty seconds. And yes, better. With the electric, I found that their were certain whiskers that would not cut no matter what I did. I ended up pulling them out with a tweezers. Never happened with a blade.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same model ten years ago and it still works great. Then, I paid $399 for it. The battery is loosing just a bit and the blades probably need to be replaced because it's so old and I use it every day .When I saw the price today I decided to put my old one out to pasture and just get a brand new one. It gives a great shave, it is easy to use, clean, charge and travel with. It is a great product! Frank F. Weisberg
customer_reviews.author: Frank F. Weisberg

customer_reviews.title: Makes the cut
customer_reviews.text: For someone who deals with sensitive skin around the neck this electric razor has been the best product I’ve used in years. Right out of the box it cut smooth and left no visible irritation tracks. Two days later the skin remains clear.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Karvonen

customer_reviews.title: With good shave creme (not foam) and wet shaving
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace shaving with a razor every day, as my skin was getting torn up by the end of the week. With good shave creme (not foam) and wet shaving, this is extremely close to as good, and I never nick myself, get razor burn, and only replace blades once a year. After a few poor electric razors over the years (including a $100 norelco), I'm shocked at how good this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHAVER I'VE EVER USED
customer_reviews.text: I almost never give rating of 5 out of 5 but this one deserves it. I've been shaving for 50 of my 66 years on this planet and tried many electric shaves, various blade shavers and none give a better shave. Not the expensive German electric or the fancy blade shavers. with a blade you get a close shave but need to run for the after shave gel to cool the scraped feeling. With other electric my 5 o'clock shadow is always nearby. With this shaver I don't need after shave nor does my 5 o'clock shadow ruin my evening.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver with cleaning/charging unit.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of trouble recently while shaving with a blade razor. After numerous cuts and scrapes, I decided to get an electric Razor. I had an old Braun that burnt out years ago and remembered how hard it was to clean, so it was important to get a shaver that could be charged and cleaned at the same time. This product fit the bill and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Quality shaver.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Braun shavers for over 50 years but quality does not seem as good quality as previously made, especially the foil cartridges. Read a lot of reviews on different shavers and this Panasonic came out on top, wish I had bought one years ago. Excellent, very close shave, I use it as a wet shaver, quick clean under running water afterwards and it is like new again. Time will tell but overall very pleased with my purchase, hence the 5 *s.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Solid Razor
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little time to adjust to the Panasonic after years of using a Braun. But after using this razor for several months now, I really like it. I recently decided to start shaving my head as well as my face. When I researched highly rated head shavers, this model was one of the highest rated models. I can say that it works very well indeed and I don't miss the Braun at all.
customer_reviews.author: McGintie

customer_reviews.title: Works well wit a nice, close shave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old 3-head norelco. The foils provide a much closer shave and it has worked great so far. The battery life is more than sufficient, but I’ve not traveled with it or had any real need to test just hos long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for legs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor for my legs. I read the other reviews and decided it was worth a try. I'm one of those who shaves daily because I hate stubble. I have been pleasantly surprised. Smooth legs. And the stubble isn't sharp like it is after using a razor. I can skip a day or two without that stabby feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: The best electric shaver man can get
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Wow, Its gives very close shave even better than shaving with a blade. The current machine I have is a Philips Norelco for which I will give a one star. Panasonic has reduced noise level drastically to the point that this will be the bench mark for electric shavers. I recommend this machine to any one wanting to switch to an electric shaver. Terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: What a beauty! My face is so sensitive, ...
customer_reviews.text: What a beauty! My face is so sensitive, a stiff breeze can cause a rash. This took a little bit for my face to adjust to, but then I no longer had issues with ingrown hair or those little shaving bumps either. I can use this every day without razor rash. Give this baby a try!
customer_reviews.author: Storm_Sword

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Every so often I visit the barber to shave my head but during my last visit he used this razor and did a great job, so I went and got one for myself lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: A Shaver Worthy of Dad's Highest Praise!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Panasonic ES-LA93-K Arc 4 Mens Electric Shaver two and a half years ago for my father. He says the razor is terrific and does a great job on his face...that one finally petered out (we couldn't get it to accept a charge anymore, and couldn't manage to open the unit to try to clean the contacts as shown on you-tube). So I bought the exact same one for him again. Usually a stoic and not particularly expressive man, when I asked him if he liked his new shaver he showed it the same respect and dare I say love that he holds only for Hersey bars (no almonds) and mashed potatoes with a hearty, "do I ever!!".:-)
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded to this shaver after 15 years with my previous Panasonic shaver... AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a new shaver, figuring that they must have improved since I purchased my current Panasonic shaver I have had for 15 years (and still running well!). This new shaver provides a FAST and PERFECT shave ... a shave I would say is as good as a new razor. Panasonic is a great brand and I trust this will last me for many years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find a new electric razor. I looked at both recent older models and newer models. The price point and reviews online drove me to buy this unit. I love a close shave and this one definitely does the job. The only down side that many of us have encountered is this is one loud unit. I'm willing to forgive that as the Arc4 does a great job for its main purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but Limited
customer_reviews.text: This is the third electric shaver I've owned. The first one in the 1950s was the best, a German shaver with a shape like a fat cigar that made it easy to manipulate to the difficult areas. This rectangular shaver does an excellent job on the side of the face but not on the neck & upper lip. It demands cleaning after just a few uses. No electric shaver can shave as closely as a safety razor, I suspect, but this one is handy when all you want is a quick touch-up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor! This razor has given me my mornings back. I can shave in the car on the way to work instead of spending 15 minutes A day and countless dollars over the year throwing away blades. In about four minutes and 10% of its battery usage I get an incredibly close shave. Had an old Panasonic from a decade ago and it lasted for years with no problems. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: TeeGirl54

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my 8249S but I found two issues with this shaver and I returned it. First, it is not ergonomic: the wand is too short and the head too big and heavy, making it difficult to hold and handle. Second, it is noisy, much more noisy than my 5 years old 8249S. It's probably because of the second motor that makes the head vibrate, and I did not find any improvement in my shave due to this feature. I also have a ES-LV65-S and it is much more quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Van

customer_reviews.title: 17 years with braun...
customer_reviews.text: Been with braun since 2002. Tried this and it works well. Much easier to clean. Cleaning station is quiet. I like the dry feature. I use soap on the foil and run the shaver, while rinsing. I have used it for a few months, five days a week. My face is adapting fine. Only a few ingrown hairs. Getting better. The shave is close.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I like this shaver; it has a wide shaving head which covers a lot of territory and works well...The handle is a little awkward... Sometimes when using it it shuts off...You have to get used to holding it and not pushing the button accidentally to shut it off... But one of my favorite things about this razor is that you can use it wet or dry so it is really flexible - this particular razor has an excellent charging capacity and lets you know when the battery is low which is helpful - so I enjoy using this a lot
customer_reviews.author: lawlibraryman

customer_reviews.title: $60 EVERY 10 MONTHS FOR THE FOIL
customer_reviews.text: Great Razor but you will spend $60 bucks every 9-10 months for the foil cover. I’m selling mine as I don’t think $72 a year for foil and that doesn’t include the cost of changing the blades. I’VE HAD IT FOR 2 YEARS NOW AND THE COST DOESN’T WARRANT THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: William Tell All

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaving Experience
customer_reviews.text: My ancient Norelco finally gave up the ghost and I was intrigued by the wet-dry concept and picked this up. I am very happy with it. The quality of the shave is very good - the first one in my experience that genuinely could be compared to a blade shave. It arrived promptly and well packaged. Unboxed and charged it up for a few hours and off we go. Only warning I would pass on, I have developed the habit from shaving with a blade razor of shaking off the water after rinsing. The large head on a small pivot did not like that motion, but it survived until I retrained my reflexes.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I've owned so far!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this b/c my Braun series 7 died after only 2 years and I have to say that this cuts my thick beard with little to no pulling of the hairs. Very pleased with this purchase so far. Will continue to update
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Coarse hair? This does not cut it
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this razor. I’m prone to ingrown hair on my entire body and the usual women’s blades have me looking like I have chicken pox. Regretfully It did not work for me. I have to go over the same spot 10+ times for it to get most of the hair. It’s literally exhausting. I would have given only one star but the fact that I have coarse hair(and plenty of it), it may work for those who are blessed with regular body hair.
customer_reviews.author: teshia salter

customer_reviews.title: The best electric razor I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this razor for 5.5 years. Yesterday i replaced the blades and screen for the first time. This razor is simply the best i have ever owned. For years I used Braun (and tried Phillips) but no matter the model the razor did not last, and the screens commonly broke. This Panasonic unit is vastly superior to the Brauns i used to buy every 2-3 years. The Panasonic has proven to be durable - both the razor and the screen and blades, and continues to hold a charge for 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Head is too big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this but I also own a Panasonic ES-LT71-S and feel it does a better job. The head on the ES-LA63-S was huge compared to the ES-LT71-S even though the blades and cutting area were about the same size. This one seems to have a lot of unnecessary bulk. After using this I went back to the ES-LT71-S and could hear it shaving what was missed. I ended up returning this because it wasn't shaving as close and the large head made it feel awkward. It seems well made but just too big.
customer_reviews.author: P.R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Burns face before shaving clean. Run out of battery trying to get a clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Naff

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Used a Norelco Rotary for the last 10 years. Decent shaver. But does not compare to the Panasonic. The Panasonic gives the closest shave I have ever experienced with an electric razor. The design allows one to easily shave all areas of the face and neck. Long lasting charge. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LV Artist

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Makes Excellent Products
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other razors over the years but none have been as good as the Panasonic. I ordered this one because it looks good left on the counter and is always charged and clean. Would recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: WDBX

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with the charge receptacle.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this type shaver with a charging dock a while ago, and still have the charging dock. But was disappointed to find that this replacement , with the same serial number, doesn't charge in the charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G.

customer_reviews.title: Close comfortable shave !
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great shave ! I used to be a Braun guy. I had forgotten what a close shave felt like. 1 pass with the Arc 4 for a very close shave. No more going over and over to still have a 5 o'clock shadow after shaving. I use lectric shave and shave dry. Very comfortable close shave with out razor burn. I might have to try gel to see what that's like. I would recommend the Arc4 to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Campbell

product_meta.title: Panasonic ES-LA63-S Arc4 Men's Electric Razor, 4-Blade Cordless with Wet/Dry Shaver Convenience
product_meta.description: Style:RazorPanasonic ES-LA63-S Arc4 Men's Electric Razor, 4-Blade Cordless with Wet/Dry Shaver Convenience
feature_bullets: Electric razor is the 4-blade, dual-motor shaving system with precision-honed 30° angle Nanotech blades for maximum durability and sharpness

Powerful Hyper Performance Dual Motor which features a linear drive that delivers 14,000 cuts her minute - that's 56,000 cross-cutting actions per minute across 4 blades - while a second motor vibrates the Arc 4 shaver head up and down to help lift and hold hair for a clean, smooth, efficient shave

The Panasonic Arc 4 Multi-Flex pivoting head enables the men's electric shaver to glide smoothly along the individual contours of the face, chin, neck and jaw and Multi-fit ARC foils gently conform to facial contours, for enhanced shaving comfort
The Panasonic shaver’s built-in Pop-Up Trimmer details sideburns and mustaches; wet/dry electric razor operation makes shaving in or out of the shower quick and convenient
Shaves per Charge (3 minutes per one shave) approximately 14 Shaves
ES-LA63-S includes a 10-stage LCD in the shaving machine handle to easily check Arc 4 razor power status, charge indicator and cleaning and replacement reminders for blades
charging time1 hour and power source is AC 100-240V (Automatic International Dual Voltage Conversion)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
